title: The Forgotten genocide
creator_credit: Atlantis Productions and J. Michael Hagopian
brief_description: An account of the genocide of the Armenians by the Turks in 1915. Includes eyewitness accounts and archival film footage. Places the events in the context of Armenian history and culture. Narrated by Mike Connors.
